text: assalaamo a’layka yaa aadama aalil e’baae
assalaamo a’layka yabna khaamese ahlil kesaae..
assalaamo a’layka wa rahmatullaahe wa barakaatohu..
As-salāmu ʿalayka yā qurrata ʿayn an-nāẓirīn al-ʿārifīn,
As-salāmu ʿalayka yā khāzina waṣāyā al-mursalīn,
As-salāmu ʿalayka yā mawlāya yā abā muḥammad,
Ashhadu annaka ḥujjatu llāhi, wa ibn ḥujjatihi,
Wa ibn amīnihi, wa abū umanāʾihi,
Wa annaka nāṣaḥta fī ʿibādatī rabbika,
Ashhadu annaka qad ʿabadta llāha ḥaqqa ʿibādatihi,
Wa aṭaʿtahu ḥaqqa ṭāʿatihi ḥattā atāka al-yaqīn,
Fa ʿalayka yā mawlāya yā ibn rasūli llāhi afḍalu at-taḥiyya, wa as-salāmu ʿalayka wa raḥmatu llāhi wa barakātuhu.
As-salāmu ʿalayka yā qāʾida ahl at-taqwā
As-salāmu ʿalayka yā bāqira ʿilmi an-nabiyyīn
As-salāmu ʿalayka yā zayna as-samāwāti wal-arḍīn
Allāhumma kamā jaʿaltahu ʿalman liʿibādika wa mustawdaʿan liḥilmika wa mutarjimā liwaḥyika
Faṣalli ʿalayhi afḍala mā ṣallayta ʿalā aḥadin min dhurriyyati anbiyāʾika wa aṣfiyāʾika wa rusulika wa umanāʾika
title: Imam Ali Zainul Abideen - As-Sajjad (as)
